org.smartfrog.sfcore.logging
Class LogRemoteImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.sfcore.logging.LogRemoteImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, LogRemote
public class LogRemoteImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogRemote

This bridges from a local log to a remote one, allowing logging over RMI

Constructor Summary

          Create a non-exported instance

Method Detail

createExportedLog

public static LogRemote createExportedLog(Log localLog)
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                          SFGeneralSecurityException
Create a log that is exported for RMI use

Parameters:
localLog - the local log to relay to
Returns:
a remote instance
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - problems exporting the object
SFGeneralSecurityException - security problems

isDebugEnabled

public boolean isDebugEnabled()
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException

Is debug logging currently enabled?

Call this method to prevent having to perform expensive operations (for example, String concatenation) when the log level is more than debug.

Specified by:
isDebugEnabled in interface LogRemote
Returns:
boolean true if debug level is currently enabled
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - in case of remote/network error
